line_1: What if we tune some merry roundelay?
line_2: Well dost thou sing, nor ill doth Jockey play.

line_1: "Ne bush, ne breere, but learnt thy roundelay.
line_2: "Who once like me could'st frame thy pipe to play

line_1: And many a well conceited roundelay
line_2: Our Squire, withouten drad, pursu'd his way,
To cheer thee at the close of day.
